biotools.summary: Alphamod is a novel pipeline that incorporates AlphaFold2 with MODELLER, a template-based modeling program. Additionally, our tool can drive a comprehensive quality assessment of the tertiary protein structure by incorporating and comparing a set of different quality assessment tools.

bioschemas.name: Alphamod
